articles.author: Naomi O’Leary
articles.title: Amazon paid no corporation tax in Europe last year despite €44bn sales - The Irish Times
articles.description: EU Commission will ‘continue to monitor Amazon’s behaviour’ on corporate taxation
articles.content:
Online retailer Amazon paid no corporation tax on its operations in Europe in 2020 despite enjoying record sales income of 43.8 billion, according to corporate filings seen by The Irish Times.
